short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lookup highlighted IP addresses with Spur Context API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension brings the power of Spur's world-class proxy and VPN detection to your Chrome browsing sessions.

Install our extension and make use of Spur's Context API to enrich IPv4 and v6 addresses on any page.

Steps to use:
- right click on the extension icon and click "options" to input your Spur API token
- highlight an IP address and use ctrl+shift+f to enrich
  - you may also click the extension icon with an IP address highlighted
  - the keyboard shortcut may be modified in Chrome's Extension settings

Note: a valid Spur Context API Key is required for use. More information can be found here https://spur.us/products/context-api

Full source code is available at https://github.com/spurintel/ChromeContext
